reviewTitle: One of the best Mid-Range Sound Bar
reviewDescription: Overall a well balanced soundbar with full range surround speakers. The wirelesss connectivity of the rear satellite speakers works like a charm. The rear satellite speakers are powered by a 24V adapter (Adapter to be plugged into one speaker and the second speaker is connected through a very long aux cable). The rear satellite speakers works like a full range front speakers with crystal clear audio. The bass is on the higher side (Levels can be adjusted as required). It has an immersive bass, which will not hamper your listening experience by unnecessarily thumping...It has a very good build quality, no cheap plastics and no visible panel gaps - Looks premium. The panels are made of glossy plastic which might get scratched.Update: If the satellite speakers are placed in direct line facing the soundbar, there will be a static noise. But when the satellite speakers are turned away from the sound bar, this static noise can be nullified.

Sound Quality is very good, Surround sound is very good, No voice Breaking, its wireless satellite speakers works very well in long range too, but the bass and loudness is little bit low according to 550watt, On paper it shows 550watt but it doesn't feel like that powerful, bass and loudness is balanced not overpowered, I will not recommend this product for bass lovers and party music lovers, but it is very good for watching movies and content because of its clear dialogue supply and very clear sound quality, (And one more thing in image it shows display and control panel is in woofer but it is in soundbar but that is not a problem it works very well). Overall nice soundbar üëç. I like it.

reviewTitle: Not up to the expectations- Disappointed with Boat
reviewDescription: I faced the satellite speaker cracking sound issue when I received the product first time so asked for technical help with Amazon but they said either I can return the product or ask for replacement, so I opted for replacement. I even try to get the help from Boat official app/portal but the product is not available in their list for technical support. However I am still facing the same issue of speaker cracking sound in the replaced product as well, so I am returning the product back.
